example: Completing this project on time is a big challenge.
The police are working to reduce crime in the city.
Urban areas usually have a high population density.
We need a new marketing strategy to increase sales.
His curiosity about space led him to study astronomy.
The mountain path descends steeply into the valley.
Be careful not to drown in the deep river.
The firework will explode in the sky at night.
The engineer checked the shaft of the machine.
The icy road is very slippery, so drive carefully.
The project is running smoothly so far.
The horror movie will terrify you if you watch it alone.
The food at that restaurant was awful.
The building is made of concrete. / We need a concrete plan.
Ice is solid water. / The table is very solid.
He likes to carve wood into beautiful shapes.
Many people live in suburban areas and commute to the city.
Using private transport can be more convenient sometimes.
We can rely on him to finish the job on time.
Farming is the main livelihood for people in this village.

chinese: 公共交通；公共交通工具
example: Using public transport helps reduce traffic congestion.
Are you in favour of the new policy?

english: improve the lives of local people
example: The new project aims to improve the lives of local people.
A good transportation network is important for a city.
Many people hope for a lower ticket price for the train.
The city plans to upgrade the subway system next year.
This new app has gained great popularity among young people.

english: encourage people to own private vehicles
example: Some policies encourage people to own private vehicles.
The government tries to keep gasoline prices low.

chinese: 使火车和公共汽车现代化
example: The company will modernize trains and buses for better service.
The city needs to expand public transportation routes.

english: make the commute a little faster
example: Upgrading the subway can make the commute a little faster.

english: produce less noise and use less energy
chinese: 产生更少噪音并使用更少能源
example: Electric cars produce less noise and use less energy.

english: enjoy the passing countryside and beautiful views
chinese: 欣赏沿途的乡村和美丽景色
example: Taking the train allows you to enjoy the passing countryside and beautiful views.
In some areas, people cannot get the quality services they need.
The seats on the old bus have only limited leg room.
Too many cars can increase air pollution in the city.
If you drive during rush hour, you might get caught in traffic jams.

english: easy to find a parking spot
example: In the suburbs, it's easy to find a parking spot.
Public transport is often cheap and convenient.
